titleInfo.title: Pris de Feau au Vaisseau Anglais

subject.topic: United States. Navy--History--Revolution, 1775-1783, War of 1812, etc.

mods.abstract: A colored print of Prise de Feu au Vaisseau Anglais, dans le Combat navale. Dessine par Garneray. Grane par Debucourt. The action between the frigates U.S.S. United States and the H.M.S. Macedonian, 1812. Additional information on back of print.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
